channel.title: [-_-_-Rune-Kingdom-_-_-]
channel.description:
Welcome to the official development topic of the new server Rune-Kingdom.. I started this server because of I was tired of seeing filthy leeches of a server. The base I will use for the devolopment of this server is indeed Deltascape now before you flame/spam/rant/ on this decision it's only because it's the best base out right now.. (don't even suggest damn Shard or Emoulus because I hate how they are categorized). Anyhow back on topic the server will have a re-made combat system so that all fighting styles will be even. Also, I will be working on adding near-perfect skills around what real RuneScape was about.. Such as both option fishing etc. The progress bar below shows the current progress of the server..
[center][size=15pt]||||||||||[/size][/center]
Now, I will show the individual status of each skill and or combat..
[img]http://rune-kingdom.no-ip.biz/highscores/images/range.gif[/img] 14% All specials working with better arrow draw back and better looking GFX. Also the hit rate has been somewhat improved.
[img]http://rune-kingdom.no-ip.biz/highscores/images/magic.gif[/img] 34% All spells working with better working timers for each type of magic (EG. Ice, Smoke etc.) spells actually freeze. Working on this mostly at the moment.
[img]http://rune-kingdom.no-ip.biz/highscores/images/attack.gif[/img][img]http://rune-kingdom.no-ip.biz/highscores/images/strength.gif[/img][img]http://rune-kingdom.no-ip.biz/highscores/images/defence.gif[/img] 74% Working specials, weapon timers, bonuses.. still need to fix up the accuracy and attack animations etc.
[img]http://rune-kingdom.no-ip.biz/highscores/images/cooking.gif[/img] 45% All food you can fish you can cook..However the burn rate is not really correct working on a new method for this..
[img]http://rune-kingdom.no-ip.biz/highscores/images/woodcutting.gif[/img] 84% Basic chopping, turning into stump, then regrows.. Code made by myself with all credits going to myself.
[img]http://rune-kingdom.no-ip.biz/highscores/images/fletching.gif[/img] 54% You use the knife on the wood and get options.. Need to incorporate make x, and crossbows.
[img]http://rune-kingdom.no-ip.biz/highscores/images/fishing.gif[/img] 78% Base made for both options to work now just need to make different XP work for both options and should then be done.
[img]http://rune-kingdom.no-ip.biz/highscores/images/firemaking.gif[/img] 98% You light the log back up.. and light another one? Will work on clipping later..
[img]http://rune-kingdom.no-ip.biz/highscores/images/crafting.gif[/img] 13% Use chisel on gem ATM, Tbh this is my least favorite skill and will be updated last..
[img]http://rune-kingdom.no-ip.biz/highscores/images/smithing.gif[/img] 81% Smithing with interfaces added.. some items are not yet smithable.
[img]http://rune-kingdom.no-ip.biz/highscores/images/mining.gif[/img] 67% You click the rock it checks for pickaxe if you successfully get it it makes the rock into a ore less rock then after a timer goes away it re-appears.
[img]http://rune-kingdom.no-ip.biz/highscores/images/herblore.gif[/img] 10% Herb on Vial is all I have atm.
[img]http://rune-kingdom.no-ip.biz/highscores/images/agility.gif[/img] 58% 2 courses set so far looking good emote wise
[img]http://rune-kingdom.no-ip.biz/highscores/images/thieving.gif[/img] 58% Stealing from stalls.. The stall gets removed then after a timer counts down it re-appears.
[img]http://rune-kingdom.no-ip.biz/highscores/images/farming.gif[/img] 10% Haven't even started yet..
[img]http://rune-kingdom.no-ip.biz/highscores/images/runecraft.gif[/img] 5% basically using the Abyss atm. Will work on soon..
Well, that is it for now will post some pictures later.. Tired atm.. constructive criticism is nice but no Flame/Spam/Ranting about Delta, ETC. Bye.

item.title: [-_-_-Rune-Kingdom-_-_-]
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

looks good hope it dont fail/get forgotting like the other ones anyways its nice.

Read full topic

item.title: [-_-_-Rune-Kingdom-_-_-]
item.dc:creator: @Zoft Zoft
item.description:
@Zoft wrote:

Welcome to the official development topic of the new server Rune-Kingdom… I started this server because of I was tired of seeing filthy leeches of a server. The base I will use for the devolopment of this server is indeed Deltascape now before you flame/spam/rant/ on this decision it’s only because it’s the best base out right now… (don’t even suggest damn Shard or Emoulus because I hate how they are categorized). Anyhow back on topic the server will have a re-made combat system so that all fighting styles will be even. Also, I will be working on adding near-perfect skills around what real RuneScape was about… Such as both option fishing etc. The progress bar below shows the current progress of the server…

[center][size=15pt]||||||||||[/size][/center]

Now, I will show the individual status of each skill and or combat…


14% All specials working with better arrow draw back and better looking GFX. Also the hit rate has been somewhat improved.


34% All spells working with better working timers for each type of magic (EG. Ice, Smoke etc.) spells actually freeze. Working on this mostly at the moment.


74% Working specials, weapon timers, bonuses… still need to fix up the accuracy and attack animations etc.


45% All food you can fish you can cook…However the burn rate is not really correct working on a new method for this…


84% Basic chopping, turning into stump, then regrows… Code made by myself with all credits going to myself.


54% You use the knife on the wood and get options… Need to incorporate make x, and crossbows.


78% Base made for both options to work now just need to make different XP work for both options and should then be done.


98% You light the log back up… and light another one? Will work on clipping later…


13% Use chisel on gem ATM, Tbh this is my least favorite skill and will be updated last…


81% Smithing with interfaces added… some items are not yet smithable.


67% You click the rock it checks for pickaxe if you successfully get it it makes the rock into a ore less rock then after a timer goes away it re-appears.


10% Herb on Vial is all I have atm.


58% 2 courses set so far looking good emote wise


58% Stealing from stalls… The stall gets removed then after a timer counts down it re-appears.


10% Haven’t even started yet…


5% basically using the Abyss atm. Will work on soon…

Well, that is it for now will post some pictures later… Tired atm… constructive criticism is nice but no Flame/Spam/Ranting about Delta, ETC. Bye.

Read full topic
